00105  
00123 cache_inode_status_t cache_inode_renew_entry( cache_entry_t        * pentry, 
00124                                               fsal_attrib_list_t   * pattr, 
00125                                               hash_table_t         * ht,
00126                                               cache_inode_client_t * pclient, 
00127                                               fsal_op_context_t    * pcontext, 
00128                                               cache_inode_status_t * pstatus )
00129 {
00130   fsal_handle_t     * pfsal_handle = NULL ;
00131   fsal_status_t       fsal_status ;
00132   fsal_attrib_list_t  object_attributes ;
00133   fsal_path_t         link_content ;
00134   time_t              current_time = time( NULL ) ;
00135   time_t              entry_time = pentry->internal_md.refresh_time ;
00136 
00137   /* If we do nothing (no expiration) then everything is all right */
00138   *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS ; 
00139 
00140 #ifdef _DEBUG_CACHE_INODE
00141   DisplayLogLevel( NIV_FULL_DEBUG, 
00142                      "Entry=%p, type=%d, current=%d, read=%d, refresh=%d, alloc=%d",
00143                      pentry, pentry->internal_md.type, current_time, 
00144                      pentry->internal_md.read_time, pentry->internal_md.refresh_time,
00145                      pentry->internal_md.alloc_time ) ;
00146 #endif
00147 
00148   /* An entry that is a regular file with an associated File Content Entry won't
00149    * expire until data exists in File Content Cache, to avoid attributes incoherency */
00150 
00151   /* @todo: BUGAZOMEU: I got serious doubts on the following blocks: possible trouble if using data caching */
00152   if( pentry->internal_md.type == REGULAR_FILE &&
00153       pentry->object.file.pentry_content != NULL )
00154     {
00155       /* Successfull exit without having nothing to do ... */
00156 
00157       DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_DEBUG,
00158                          "Entry %p is a REGULAR_FILE with associated data cached %p, no expiration", 
00159                          pentry, pentry->object.file.pentry_content ) ;
00160       
00161       *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS ; 
00162       return *pstatus ;
00163     }
00164   
00165   /* Do we use getattr/mtime checking */
00166   if( pclient->getattr_dir_invalidation &&
00167       pentry->internal_md.type == DIR_BEGINNING &&
00168       FSAL_TEST_MASK(  pclient->attrmask , FSAL_ATTR_MTIME ) &&
00169       pentry->object.dir_begin.has_been_readdir == CACHE_INODE_YES )  
00170     {
00171         /* This checking is to be done ... */
00172         pfsal_handle = &pentry->object.dir_begin.handle ;
00173 
00174         /* Call FSAL to get the attributes */
00175         object_attributes.asked_attributes = pclient->attrmask  ;
00176 
00177         fsal_status = FSAL_getattrs( pfsal_handle, pcontext, &object_attributes ) ;
00178 
00179         if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( fsal_status ) )
00180         {
00181           *pstatus = cache_inode_error_convert( fsal_status ) ;
00182 
00183           if( fsal_status.major == ERR_FSAL_STALE )
00184            {
00185                 cache_inode_status_t kill_status ;
00186 
00187                 DisplayLog( "cache_inode_renew_entry: Stale FSAL File Handle detected for pentry = %p, line %u", pentry, __LINE__ ) ;
00188 
00189                 if( cache_inode_kill_entry( pentry, ht, pclient, &kill_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00190                     DisplayLog( "cache_inode_renew_entry: Could not kill entry %p, status = %u", pentry, kill_status ) ;
00191         
00192                *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_FSAL_ESTALE ;
00193            }
00194           /* stat */
00195           pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_RENEW_ENTRY] += 1 ;
00196 
00197           return *pstatus ;
00198         }
00199 
00200 #ifdef  _DEBUG_CACHE_INODE
00201       DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_FULL_DEBUG,
00202                          "Entry=%p, type=%d, Cached Time=%d, FSAL Time=%d",  
00203                          pentry, pentry->internal_md.type,
00204                          pentry->object.dir_begin.attributes.mtime.seconds,
00205                          object_attributes.mtime.seconds ) ;
00206 #endif
00207  
00208         /* Compare the FSAL mtime and the cached mtime */
00209         if( pentry->object.dir_begin.attributes.mtime.seconds < object_attributes.mtime.seconds )
00210           {
00211              /* Cached directory content is obsolete, it must be renewed */
00212               pentry->object.dir_begin.attributes = object_attributes ;
00213 
00214 
00215              /* Return the attributes as set */
00216              if( pattr != NULL )
00217                 *pattr = object_attributes ;
00218 
00219              /* Set the directory content as "to be renewed" */
00220              /* Next call to cache_inode_readdir will repopulate the dirent array */
00221              pentry->object.dir_begin.has_been_readdir = CACHE_INODE_RENEW_NEEDED ;
00222 
00223             /* Set the refresh time for the cache entry */
00224             pentry->internal_md.refresh_time = time( NULL ) ;
00225     
00226             DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_DEBUG,
00227                               "cached directory content for entry %p must be renewed, due to getattr mismatch", pentry ) ;
00228          
00229           } /* if( pentry->object.dir_begin.attributes.mtime < object_attributes.asked_attributes.mtime ) */
00230     } /* if( pclient->getattr_dir_invalidation && ... */
00231     
00232   /* Check for dir content expiration */
00233   if( pentry->internal_md.type == DIR_BEGINNING                    &&
00234       pclient->grace_period_dirent != 0                            &&
00235       pentry->object.dir_begin.has_been_readdir == CACHE_INODE_YES &&
00236       ( current_time - entry_time > pclient->grace_period_dirent ) )
00237     {
00238       /* stat */
00239       pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_call[CACHE_INODE_RENEW_ENTRY] += 1 ;
00240       
00241       /* Log */
00242 #ifdef  _DEBUG_CACHE_INODE
00243       DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_FULL_DEBUG, 
00244                          "Entry=%p, type=%d, Time=%d, current=%d, grace_period_dirent=%d", 
00245                          pentry, pentry->internal_md.type, 
00246                          entry_time, current_time, pclient->grace_period_dirent ) ;
00247       
00248       DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_FULL_DEBUG, 
00249                          "cached directory entries for entry %p must be renewed", pentry ) ;
00250 #endif
00251     
00252       /* Do the getattr if it had not being done before */
00253       if( pfsal_handle == NULL )
00254        {  
00255           pfsal_handle = &pentry->object.dir_begin.handle ;
00256       
00257           /* Call FSAL to get the attributes */
00258           object_attributes.asked_attributes = pclient->attrmask  ;
00259       
00260           fsal_status = FSAL_getattrs( pfsal_handle, pcontext, &object_attributes ) ;
00261       
00262           if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( fsal_status ) ) 
00263             {
00264               *pstatus = cache_inode_error_convert( fsal_status ) ;
00265           
00266               /* stat */
00267               pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_RENEW_ENTRY] += 1 ;
00268 
00269               if( fsal_status.major == ERR_FSAL_STALE )
00270                 {
00271                      cache_inode_status_t kill_status ;
00272 
00273                      DisplayLog( "cache_inode_renew_entry: Stale FSAL File Handle detected for pentry = %p, line %u", pentry, __LINE__ ) ;
00274 
00275                      if( cache_inode_kill_entry( pentry, ht, pclient, &kill_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00276                          DisplayLog( "cache_inode_renew_entry: Could not kill entry %p, status = %u", pentry, kill_status ) ;
00277 
00278                     *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_FSAL_ESTALE ;
00279                 }
00280  
00281               return *pstatus ;
00282             }
00283         } 
00284 
00285       pentry->object.dir_begin.attributes = object_attributes ;
00286        
00287       /* Return the attributes as set */
00288       if( pattr != NULL )
00289         *pattr = object_attributes ;
00290       
00291       /* Set the directory content as "to be renewed" */
00292       /* Next call to cache_inode_readdir will repopulate the dirent array */
00293       pentry->object.dir_begin.has_been_readdir = CACHE_INODE_RENEW_NEEDED ;
00294 
00295       /* Set the refresh time for the cache entry */
00296       pentry->internal_md.refresh_time = time( NULL ) ;
00297 
00298     } /* if( pentry->internal_md.type == DIR_BEGINNING && ... */
00299         
00300     /* if the directory has not been readdir, only update its attributes */
00301         
00302     else if ( pentry->internal_md.type == DIR_BEGINNING                    &&
00303               pclient->grace_period_attr != 0                              &&
00304               pentry->object.dir_begin.has_been_readdir != CACHE_INODE_YES &&
00305               ( current_time - entry_time > pclient->grace_period_attr ) )
00306     {
00307       /* stat */
00308       pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_call[CACHE_INODE_RENEW_ENTRY] += 1 ;
00309       
00310       /* Log */
00311 #ifdef  _DEBUG_CACHE_INODE
00312       DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_DEBUG, 
00313                          "Entry=%p, type=%d, Time=%d, current=%d, grace_period_dirent=%d", 
00314                          pentry, pentry->internal_md.type, 
00315                          entry_time, current_time, pclient->grace_period_dirent ) ;
00316       
00317       DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_DEBUG, 
00318                          "cached directory entries for entry %p must be renewed", pentry ) ;
00319 #endif
00320 
00321       
00322       pfsal_handle = &pentry->object.dir_begin.handle ;
00323       
00324       /* Call FSAL to get the attributes */
00325       object_attributes.asked_attributes = pclient->attrmask  ;
00326       
00327       fsal_status = FSAL_getattrs( pfsal_handle, pcontext, &object_attributes ) ;
00328       
00329       if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( fsal_status ) ) 
00330         {
00331           *pstatus = cache_inode_error_convert( fsal_status ) ;
00332           
00333           /* stat */
00334           pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_RENEW_ENTRY] += 1 ;
00335          
00336           if( fsal_status.major == ERR_FSAL_STALE )
00337            {
00338                 cache_inode_status_t kill_status ;
00339 
00340                 DisplayLog( "cache_inode_renew_entry: Stale FSAL File Handle detected for pentry = %p, line %u", pentry, __LINE__ ) ;
00341 
00342                 if( cache_inode_kill_entry( pentry, ht, pclient, &kill_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00343                     DisplayLog( "cache_inode_renew_entry: Could not kill entry %p, status = %u", pentry, kill_status ) ;
00344 
00345                 *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_FSAL_ESTALE ;
00346            }
00347  
00348           return *pstatus ;
00349         }
00350       
00351       pentry->object.dir_begin.attributes = object_attributes ;
00352       
00353       /* Return the attributes as set */
00354       if( pattr != NULL )
00355         *pattr = object_attributes ;
00356 
00357       /* Set the refresh time for the cache entry */
00358       pentry->internal_md.refresh_time = time( NULL ) ;
00359 
00360     } /* else if( pentry->internal_md.type == DIR_BEGINNING && ... */
00361     
00362   /* Check for attributes expiration in other cases*/
00363     
00364   else if(  pentry->internal_md.type   != DIR_CONTINUE    &&
00365             pentry->internal_md.type   != DIR_BEGINNING   &&       
00366             pclient->grace_period_attr != 0               && 
00367             ( current_time - entry_time > pclient->grace_period_attr ) )
00368     {
00369       /* stat */
00370       pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_call[CACHE_INODE_RENEW_ENTRY] += 1 ;
00371 
00372       /* Log */
00373       DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_DEBUG, 
00374                          "Entry=%p, type=%d, Time=%d, current=%d, grace_period_attr=%d", 
00375                          pentry, pentry->internal_md.type, 
00376                          entry_time, current_time, pclient->grace_period_attr ) ;
00377       
00378       DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_DEBUG, 
00379                          "Attributes for entry %p must be renewed", pentry ) ;
00380       
00381       switch( pentry->internal_md.type )
00382         {
00383         case REGULAR_FILE:
00384           pfsal_handle = &pentry->object.file.handle ;
00385           break ;
00386           
00387         case SYMBOLIC_LINK:
00388           pfsal_handle  = &pentry->object.symlink.handle ;
00389           break ;
00390           
00391         case SOCKET_FILE:
00392         case FIFO_FILE:
00393         case CHARACTER_FILE:
00394         case BLOCK_FILE:
00395           pfsal_handle  = &pentry->object.special_obj.handle ;
00396           break ;          
00397         }
00398       
00399       /* Call FSAL to get the attributes */
00400       object_attributes.asked_attributes = pclient->attrmask  ; 
00401       fsal_status = FSAL_getattrs( pfsal_handle, pcontext, &object_attributes ) ;
00402       if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( fsal_status ) ) 
00403         {
00404           *pstatus = cache_inode_error_convert( fsal_status ) ;
00405           
00406           /* stat */
00407           pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_RENEW_ENTRY] += 1 ;
00408          
00409           if( fsal_status.major == ERR_FSAL_STALE )
00410            {
00411                 cache_inode_status_t kill_status ;
00412 
00413                 DisplayLog( "cache_inode_renew_entry: Stale FSAL File Handle detected for pentry = %p, line %u", pentry, __LINE__ ) ;
00414 
00415                 if( cache_inode_kill_entry( pentry, ht, pclient, &kill_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00416                     DisplayLog( "cache_inode_renew_entry: Could not kill entry %p, status = %u", pentry, kill_status ) ;
00417 
00418                *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_FSAL_ESTALE ;
00419            }
00420  
00421           return *pstatus ;
00422         }
00423       
00424       /* Keep the new attribute in cache */
00425       switch( pentry->internal_md.type )
00426         {
00427         case REGULAR_FILE:
00428           pentry->object.file.attributes = object_attributes ;
00429           break ;
00430           
00431         case SYMBOLIC_LINK:
00432           pentry->object.symlink.attributes = object_attributes ;
00433           break ;
00434           
00435         case SOCKET_FILE:
00436         case FIFO_FILE:
00437         case CHARACTER_FILE:
00438         case BLOCK_FILE:
00439           pentry->object.special_obj.attributes = object_attributes;
00440           break ;          
00441         }
00442       
00443       /* Return the attributes as set */
00444       if( pattr != NULL )
00445         *pattr = object_attributes ;
00446 
00447       /* Set the refresh time for the cache entry */
00448       pentry->internal_md.refresh_time = time( NULL ) ;
00449       
00450     } /* if(  pentry->internal_md.type   != DIR_CONTINUE && ... */
00451     
00452   /* Check for link content expiration */
00453   if( pentry->internal_md.type == SYMBOLIC_LINK &&
00454       pclient->grace_period_link != 0           &&
00455       ( current_time - entry_time  > pclient->grace_period_link ) )
00456     {
00457       pfsal_handle  = &pentry->object.symlink.handle ;
00458 
00459       /* TMP DEBUG */
00460        DisplayLogJd( pclient->log_outputs, "Entry=%p, type=%d, Time=%d, current=%d, grace_period_link=%d", 
00461                    pentry, pentry->internal_md.type, 
00462                    entry_time, current_time, pclient->grace_period_link ) ;
00463 
00464       /* Log */
00465       DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_DEBUG, 
00466                          "Entry=%p, type=%d, Time=%d, current=%d, grace_period_link=%d", 
00467                          pentry, pentry->internal_md.type, 
00468                          entry_time, current_time, pclient->grace_period_link ) ;
00469       DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_DEBUG, 
00470                          "cached link content for entry %p must be renewed", pentry ) ;
00471 
00472       FSAL_CLEAR_MASK( object_attributes.asked_attributes ) ;
00473       FSAL_SET_MASK( object_attributes.asked_attributes, pclient->attrmask ) ;
00474 
00475       fsal_status = FSAL_readlink( pfsal_handle, pcontext, &link_content, &object_attributes  ) ;
00476       if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( fsal_status ) ) 
00477         { 
00478           *pstatus = cache_inode_error_convert( fsal_status ) ; 
00479           /* stats */
00480           pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_RENEW_ENTRY] += 1 ;
00481          
00482           if( fsal_status.major == ERR_FSAL_STALE )
00483            {
00484                 cache_inode_status_t kill_status ;
00485 
00486                 DisplayLog( "cache_inode_renew_entry: Stale FSAL File Handle detected for pentry = %p, line %u", pentry, __LINE__ ) ;
00487 
00488                 if( cache_inode_kill_entry( pentry, ht, pclient, &kill_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00489                     DisplayLog( "cache_inode_renew_entry: Could not kill entry %p, status = %u", pentry, kill_status ) ;
00490         
00491                *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_FSAL_ESTALE ;
00492            }
00493  
00494         }
00495       else
00496         {
00497           fsal_status = FSAL_pathcpy( &pentry->object.symlink.content, &link_content ) ;
00498           if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( fsal_status ) ) 
00499             {
00500               *pstatus = cache_inode_error_convert( fsal_status ) ;
00501                /* stats */
00502               pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_RENEW_ENTRY] += 1 ;            
00503             }
00504         }
00505 
00506       /* Set the refresh time for the cache entry */
00507       pentry->internal_md.refresh_time = time( NULL ) ;
00508 
00509     } /* if( pentry->internal_md.type == SYMBOLIC_LINK && ... */
00510   
00511   
00512   return *pstatus ;
00513 } /* cache_inode_renew_entry */
